Title: I see what you're saying: intrusive images from listening to a traumatic verbal report
Author: Krans, Julie; Naring, Gerard; Holmes, Emily A.; Becker, Eni S.
ExperimentalCondition: Visualspatial interference task during encoding (shaping plasticine)
EncodingTask: Lisen to verbal report of trauma film
ResultSummary: Intrusion frequency was significantly lower in the visuospatial interference condition compared to the no-task control condition
